snippet.title: Metal Gear Solid: Social Ops | "MISSION" Gameplay
snippet.description:
There's a lot going on in this video. Mainly just a bunch of tapping on the screen to progress through the levels. Mission mode is probably the easiest mode and it's the only mode that gives you experience points to level up. However, at some points the word "CAUTION" pops up at the top of the screen indicating you have a chance to be discovered by the enemy. I found this can be avoided by waiting a couple seconds before tapping the screen.

As you probably noticed, midway through the video I was stopped and a "WARNING" came up on my screen. This means you have reached the next boss battle. Sometimes you'll run into soldiers and tanks (which are SUPER easy and can be done with minimal BP) but sometimes you'll face an AI in this case the PUPA which are EXTREMELY hard even with a great deck and maxed out BP. The AIs are designed to require you to use your friends list and call upon the help of the people you've added. Each person who attempts to take down the enemy is part of a "chain" that builds up. Every person who contributed to the chain is awarded prizes after the enemy is defeated.

The last thing you'll run into in MISSION mode is random (N) or "Normal) cards. These are weaker cards with almost no use other than using them to upgrade your stronger cards.
